virtual-sensor.name: Matterhorn_Dozer_Th3Temp__conv
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerTh3TempMsg) from Matterhorn deployment converted

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, GENERATION_TIME, TIMESTAMP, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_NO, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_T1>-9989,cast(round(PAYLOAD_T1 / 100.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as TEMPERATURE_5CM, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_T2>-9989,cast(round(PAYLOAD_T2 / 100.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as TEMPERATURE_10CM, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_T3>-9989,cast(round(PAYLOAD_T3 / 100.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as TEMPERATURE_20CM, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_T4>-9989,cast(round(PAYLOAD_T4 / 100.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as TEMPERATURE_30CM, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_T5>-9989,cast(round(PAYLOAD_T5 / 100.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as TEMPERATURE_50CM, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_T6>-9989,cast(round(PAYLOAD_T6 / 100.0, 2) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as TEMPERATURE_100CM from wrapper
